##loading packages
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(nycflights13)
library(here)
library(janitor)
```

##load in 2022 data
```{r}
thisfile=here("data_raw","DL_SelectFields2022.zip")

df2022=read_csv(thisfile) %>% clean_names()
```

##myspace
```{r}
df1 <- df2022 %>% group_by(carrier_name) %>% filter(passengers>0, origin =="LGA")
```
